name: vscode-ai
description: Visual Studio Code extension for Azure Machine Learning

azureML.schemasVersion.description: Version prefix of the schemas to show (i.e. 0.0.22-october-cand will show 0.0.22-october-cand/workspace.schema.json from the blob)

explorer/context.when: resourceLangId == python && !AzureMLRunExperimentInProgress && AzureMLLastRunAvailable && config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0

editor/context.when: resourceLangId == python && !AzureMLRunExperimentInProgress && AzureMLLastRunAvailable && config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0

view/item/context.when: config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode == 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLComputeClusterRoot$/
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode == 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLComputeClusterRoot$/
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode == 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLComputeRoot$/
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode == 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLComputeRoot$/
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode == 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLComputeInstanceRoot$/
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode == 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLComputeInstanceRoot$/
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode == 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLDatasetRoot
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode == 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLDatasetRoot
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode == 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLDatastoreRoot
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode == 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLDatastoreRoot
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode == 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLServiceRoot
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode == 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLServiceRoot
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode == 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLEnvironmentRoot
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode == 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLEnvironmentRoot
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode == 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLExperimentRoot
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode == 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLExperimentRoot
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode == 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLModelRoot
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode == 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLModelRoot
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode == 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLAttachedComputeRoot$/
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode == 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLAttachedComputeRoot$/
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode == 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLSubscription
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLComputeCluster(?!Root).*$/
view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLComputeInstance(Running|Stopped|Intermediate)SSHEnabled.*$/
view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLComputeInstance(Running|Stopped|Intermediate)SSHEnabled.*$/
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLComputeInstanceRoot
view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLComputeInstance(Running|Stopped|Failed).*$/
view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLComputeInstance(Running|Stopped).*CanUse$/
view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLComputeInstanceRunning.*$/
view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLComputeInstanceStopped.*$/
view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLComputeInstanceRunning.*$/
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLComputeInstance(?!Root).*$/
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureML(ComputeCluster|InferenceCluster)Root$/
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureML(InferenceCluster|AttachedCompute)Root$/
view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureML(InferenceCluster|AttachedCompute)(?!Root).*$/
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLComputeCluster
view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureML(ComputeCluster|InferenceCluster)$/
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureML(ComputeCluster(?!Local)|InferenceCluster|AttachedCompute)(?!Root).*$/
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLDatasetRoot
view == AzureMLExplorer && config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLDataset(Single|Mult)Version.*$/
view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLDatasetVersiontabular
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLDatasetVersion.*$/
view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLDataset(Single|Mult)Version.*$/
view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLDatasetMultVersiontabular

config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLDatastore(Editable|AutoCreated)$
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLDatastore(Editable|AutoCreated)?$/
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLDatastore(Editable|AutoCreated)?$/
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLEnvironmentRoot
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLEnvironment
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLEnvironment
view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLEnvironmentCurated
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLExperimentRoot
view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLExperiment
view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLExperiment && config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLModelRoot
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLModel
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLModel
view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLModel
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLModel
view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLRun(Remote|Local).*CANCELLABLE.*$/
view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLRun(Remote|Local).*$/
view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLRun(Remote|Local).*$/
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLRunLocalDebugWaiting.*$/

view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLRunOutput
view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLRun(Remote|Local).*$/
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLRun(Remote|Local).*$/
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLRun(Remote|Local).*$/
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLComputeCluster(?!Root).*$/
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLRunConfig
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLRunConfig
view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLRunConfig && config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0  && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLServiceRoot
view == AzureMLExplorer && config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && viewItem == AzureMLService
view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLService
config.azureML.CLI Compatibility Mode != 2.0 && view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLService

view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLWorkspaceDefault
view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem =~ /^AzureMLWorkspace(Default)?$/
view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLWorkspace
view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLWorkspace
view == AzureMLExplorer && viewItem == AzureMLSubscription

view == AzureMLExplorer && (!viewItem || viewItem =~ /^AzureML(Subscription|Workspace(Default)?|(Compute(Instance|Cluster)?|InferenceCluster|AttachedCompute)Root|ModelRoot|ServiceRoot|Experiment(Root)?|Environment(Curated)?Root)$/)

scripts.lint: tslint --config ./tslint.json ./src/**/*.ts && cd azureml-language-server && npm run lint
scripts.postinstall: babel --presets es2015 -d node_modules/@azureml/ node_modules/@azureml && cd ./azureml-language-server && npm install
scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm install && npm run clean && npm run createInitializeScript && npm run webpack && cd ./azureml-language-server && npm run prepublishOnly
